attributes.action: Tell us why politicians are not having their pay and allowances docked for failure to do their job.
attributes.additional_details: Throughout our society WHEREVER there is involvement of politicians the organization of the country is falling apart.  Criminals are ruling the roost.  Police services refuse to stop children being raped and buggered by foreigners.  Border guards are afraid to do their job under threat of being accused of racism by our elected representatives AND NOT ONE POLITICIAN HAS LOST HIS JOB OR EVEN ONE SINGLE PENNY OF HIS SALARY FOR ALL THIS ABJECT FAILURE.  WHY NOT.

rejection.details: This is not a matter for Government
